widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: Hello everyone! I'm Abigail Pauli, a 20-year-old originally from Saltillo, Coahuila. I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Systems Engineering. My passion for learning motivates me to enhance my skills consistently. I have an unquenchable curiosity, constantly exploring new ways to spend my free time. My interests include visual arts, reading, and music. I firmly believe that we can all reach our goals by maintaining a continuous commitment to improvement. This principle guides my daily life.

Hello, everyone! I'm Diego Lopez. I'm a 21-year-old from Saltillo, Coahuila, pursuing a Computer Systems Engineering degree with a strong interest in becoming a proficient full-stack developer. While I used to hit the gym frequently, my busy schedule has kept me away lately. However, I still enjoy playing musical instruments, primarily the guitar, in my free time. I'm a perpetual learner, always eager to stay updated and share the knowledge I acquire with others.
